pr_title: Provide a default symbol table provider implementation

timeline.message: Provide a default symbol table provider implementation that doesn't use symbol tables for requests/responses of its own, but is able to retrieve remote symbol tables to decode responses from other services

timeline.bodyText: minor: Do you think there will be usecase to inject local symbol table? If so consider adding an API to do that.
timeline.author: karthikbalasub

timeline.bodyText: minor: disconnect finally since this is only one use.
timeline.author: aman1309

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Without this we would have leaked sockets on error responses. Fixed.
replies.author: karthikrg
